name: Pepper's Computer Quest 85
description:
Pepper's Computer Quest '85.

Help Pepper reunite with his stolen computer. Travel across 15 different levels, fight enemies, collect shurikens and dodge spikes!

Controls:

Enter - Continue, start game

X - Jump

Z - Run

Down - Crouch

Left - Move left

Right - Move right

Up - Use weapon

P - Pause

To play on Windows, open the executable, then open the data.win file.
